name: EFS Datavoyager
title: EFS Datavoyager
body:

DV - system dependencies

DV - Support Information ‚Üí from the developers

17

DV 5 - AWS

this is true since the 21.1 Upgrade June 2021

The entry is pending a proper wording and translation

jeder DV hat eine Instanz ID

Alt:
dv nutzt ordnerstruktur zur Zuordnung: ie. technical name (ordnername, i.e. bakingfeedback, oder so 3uu bl√∂disnn wie in Globis) + ordnername mit dv Nummer (auch am orderpfad orientiert)

Neu:
DVs nicht mehr in den Installations ordnern:
/nfs/dv-instances (parallel zu /nfs/installation)
ID ist jetzt config Option: kann frei gew√§hlt werden, aber um zuordnung machbar zu machen
technical name + nummerierung: ab1234-no1
Aber auch frei w√§hlbar, ie Telekom bekommt f√ºr die Infoplatform so was (siehe Doku f√ºr Migrationspfad Migration Path to DV5 )

InstanzID gibt den Ordner in /nfs/dv-instances vor

DV hat entgegen EFS die Config nicht im nfs liegen.
Version wird nciht wie bei EFS festgelegt
DVs laufen mit der aktuellen Version im Container.

DV hat gem√§√ü Instanz ID eine generische DV domain, also: dv-ab1234-no1.customervoice360.com

Bei Legacy:
alle existierenden DVs haben altes DNS setup bekommen: Pro EFS instanz 1(eins!) DV der angesprochen werden kann
Wird unter dem alten Pfad zur Verf√ºgung gestellt

Wenn benutzt mit dem Interface, dann login erreichbar unter alter domain, nach dem login ist das dann /datavoyager, aber grunds√§tzlich alles erreichbar unter dem alten pfad

Bei neuen Instanzen:
Passwort f√ºr root selbes wie fr√ºher
db hei√üt nun: dv_ab1234_no1
bekommt eigene Passw√∂rter und user f√ºr diese DB: dv-techsupport (PW siehe Keypass)
Application Ini not available for TS
Customizings werden sich im /nfs/dv-instances/ab1234-no1 Verezichnis direkt finden, nicht sepparat wie bei EFS (Interview mal gordon)
Cstomizings sind hier aus git zu nehmen. nono bad nfs only terrible dont
-> mit diesem Namen zu finden in bitbucket :) simple as cake

Bei Troubleshooting bis auf weiteres Sysadmin Support ben√∂tigt: TIVI-1004(by Niko) liegt bei Arne

drinne ist: build fix, one build, db ist erstellt, autohealself ist gelaufen, crons bereits aktiv, da von TS keine special configurationes mehr n√∂tig

Special for Dashbo:
welches Dashbo soll er ansprechen? preview oder prod (so lang es das preview gibt, prod steht noch nicht)
ok von pm einholen! immer!

OLD - AWS

In the AWS the fastbit changes from: fastbit.global-services.svc.cluster.local

to: fastbit.global-service-fastbit.svc.cluster.local

This has to be adjusted if an installation moves to AWS and also for newly installed installations.

OLD - Set up DV 4 using scripts

DV 4.1 (Report Manager)

  • Open console and connect to corresponding server

  • Navigate to installation path

    • i [domain]

  • Execute the following within the htdocs folder:

    • helpersCreateNewDataVoyager

    • The script creates the DV folder and also gets the needed build

  • Handover to System Administration for DV database creation and frontend restart

    • dv database name: dv_xxx (replace xxx with the generated part of the client's domain xxx.customervoice360.com)

    • Host, port, user and passwort need to be the same as for the EFS installation (grep "__db" conf/config.inc.php3)

    • Frontend restart

  • After the database has been created execute healself within the corresponding DV folder

    • DV 4.1 needs php 5.6 /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php56/bin/php support/healself.php

  • If needed, add additional customizings Loader or other DV customizings/ check out repository

  • Change root password, e.g. using script dv/support/changeRootPw.php Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

    • (php 5.3.6 can be used /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php-5.3.6/bin/php) php support/changeRootPw.php

  • Add root password to Passwordsafe in corresponding folder e.g. "Data Voyager 3"

  • Add DV to Globis. e.g. using corresponding helpers script Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

    • cd dv/

    • helpersAddInstallationInGlobis

    • All required information will be gathered by the script

  • Let System Administration activate the cron job (as the cron job is set up per folder, please mention the exact folder name of the DV) Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

  • Login to DV using root account

    • [Installation_name]/dv

  • Add database of EFS installation

    • Data Sources >> + >> Add database:

      • get information by executing: grep __db conf/config.inc.php3

      • set Data source to 'active'

  • Goto section Activate Report Manager (if it was requested) ( fix this link later: [Support.SupportDV4#Activate_Report_Manager][Activate Report Manager]])

  • Add DV user

    • Log in to DV using root account

    • User Management >> +

      • Enter information of user

      • Set user to active and set a high expiry date

    • Send password: User Management >> mark user >> Send mail >> Invitation

  • Inform 1st level support respectively the person who requested the DV

Handover to Sysadmins

The following output will be printed by helpersCreateNewDataVoyager script. Use it for handing over the case to sysadmins.

Hi Admins,

Please create a new DV database: 

Installation: [URL]

resources.db.adapter = "MYSQLI" 
resources.db.params.adapterNamespace = "Oat_Db_Adapter" 
resources.db.params.host = "" 
resources.db.params.dbname = "" 
resources.db.params.username = "" 
resources.db.params.password = "" 
resources.db.params.port = 

Please also restart the frontends.

TS Setup Checklist

[] Execute healself within the corresponding DV folder
[] (optional) add additional customizings Loader or other DV customizings/ check out repository
[] Change root password
[] Add root password to Passwordsafe
[] Add DV to Globis
[] Let System Administration activate the cron job and restart Lighty (as the cron job is set up per folder, please mention the exact folder name of the DV)
[] Add EFS database in DV admin area
[] Add DV user (if any were requested)
[] Inform 1st level support respectively the person who requested the DV

DV 4.0

As of now (2017-08-04) the set up of DV 4 is the same as for DV3 and DV2. Since 2017-10-16 the DV also can be set up using the helpers script helpersCreateNewDataVoyager
SupportDV2 Set up DV using scripts

OLD - Set up DV manually

As of now (2017-08-04) the set up of DV 4 is the same as for DV3 and DV2.

  • Ask Sysadmins to create database

    • dv database name: dv_xxx (replace xxx with the generated part of the client's domain xxx.customervoice360.com)

    • Host, port, user and password need to be the same as for the EFS installation (grep "__db" conf/config.inc.php3)

  • Create DV folder below htdocs

  • Get latest DV build

    • Use helpers script

      • cd /dumps/bashHelpersEFS_TS/

      • ./getBuilds.sh EFS_DV-2.2

    • Alternative you can get the latest build from Guardian Neccessary accounts and accesses

      • Save build to desktop, copy it into your home folder in the gateway in /nfs/dumps to unzip and from there move it into DV folder of installation (like rsync without excludes)

    • Alternatively use wget command:

      • wget -N -T 30 -A zip --no-check-certificate --http-user=efsbuilds --http-password=ocieXo3eeR¬†https://efsbuilds.3uu.de/EFS_DV-2.2_0081.zip

  • Within DV folder

    • prepare application.ini

      • cd dv/application/configs/

      • cp template_application.ini application.ini

    • adjust application.ini

      • Enter database connection for DV database that admins created

        • see config of EFS instalaltion: grep "__db" ../../../conf/config.inc.php3

        • Fastbit IP: check other environments until this page is updated

      • Adjust path to DV: (oat.customer_path), corresponds to the folder the DV has ben created in

      • Adjust temporary path (see config of EFS installation)

    • Within dv folder

      • Create "dv/custom" folder and check rights (should be 775)

      • Create folder "dv/nfs/Datasource/File/" and check rights (should be 777)

      • Execute healself

        • (php 5.3.6: /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php-5.3.6/bin/php) php support/healself.php

        • If error¬†Error by application initialization: Directory xyz/dv/application/../custom/¬†is shown, the missing folder needs to be created

  • If needed, add additional customizings¬†Loader or other DV customizings/ check out repository

  • Change root password, e.g. using script dv/support/changeRootPw.php¬†Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

    • (php 5.3.6: /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php-5.3.6/bin/php) php support/changeRootPw.php

  • Add DV to Globis. e.g. using corresponding helpers script¬†Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

    • cd dv/

    • helpersAddInstallationInGlobis

    • All required information will be gathered by the script

  • Let System Administration activate cron jobs and restart Lighty¬†Do NOT execute on procus or on mirror server

  • Login to DV using root account

    • [Installation_name]/dv

    • Add database of EFS installation

      • Data Sources >> + >> Add database:

        • get information by executing: grep __db conf/config.inc.php3

  • Add DV user

    • Log in to DV using root account

      • If you get a 500 Server Error, check the php error logs

        • PHP Fatal error: Call-time pass-by-reference has been removed in /nfs/opst3/snapshot.qb-feedback.com/htdocs/dv/library/efs/filefunx.php on line 1001¬†THIS IS RELATED TO PHP 5.6. DV ONLY WORKS WITH PHP 5.3.6¬†Installations running on php56 frontends only can not have a DV currently

    • User Management >> +

      • Enter information of user

      • Set user to active and set a high expiry date

    • Send password: User Management >> mark user >> Send mail >> Invitation

  • Inform 1st level support respectively the person who requested the DV

Activate Report Manager

The Report Manager already is active on Data Voyagers of version 4.x but you have to add rights to roles so that users can view the new menu.

  • the reportmanager module must be activated (system -> options -> platform cockpit) -> add reportmanager to the modules parameter

  • the following services in the service layer must be activated (especially you need to blick them from no to yes) and have the right permissions for the user that is going to be used: reportmanager.status.deleteOrder, reportmanager.status.deleteReports, reportmanager.status.updateOrderStatus, see screenshot:

  • a service layer token must be created for the user that is to be used

  • see this screenshot of the Data Voyager ‚Üí Data sources:

  • Log in to DV using the root account

  • Click on "Roles & Rights"

  • Edit the "Admin" team

  • Check all rights related to "Report Management"

  • Go to configuration and change variable "pptxservice.properties.service_domain" to "https://rp.questback.com/pptx_20/EfsService.svc?singleWsdl"

OLD - Updates and Rollout

  • Link zu den DV - system dependencies nicht √ºbersehen!

  • WICHTIG: vor allen RSYNC-Befehlen unbedingt die Rechte der Quelldateien auf 775 √§ndern mit chmod 775 EFS_DV-4.X und die Admins bitten die Rechte unter /dv grade zu ziehen

  • DV 4.3 und neuer ben√∂tigt PHP 5.6 und kann ohne ME-Guide ab EFS 19.1, ansonsten ab EFS 19.4 verwendet werden!

  • Check Build:

cd dv
cat BUILDNAME

  • gew√ºnschte Builds kopieren: helpersEfsGetBuild EFS_DV-4.1_0035.zip

  • z.B. in dumps/deinNachname/ ablegen und mit unzip -q EFS_DV-4.1_0035.zip entpacken

  • rsync Befehl erst mit n = nothing ausf√ºhren und pr√ºfen welche Dateien durch --delete gel√∂scht werden und ggf. mit DEV kl√§ren, mit q = quiet werden nur Errors ausgegeben.

  • ausf√ºhren in Ordner dv

rsync -avnqz --delete --exclude=/application/configs/application.ini  --exclude=/public/themes/ --exclude=/custom/ --exclude=/public/custom/ --exclude=/public/__generated/ /dumps/EFS_DV-4.2_0057/* .

  • Anschlie√üend das n entfernen, damit der richtige rsync Befehl durchl√§uft

rsync -avz --delete --exclude=/application/configs/application.ini  --exclude=/public/themes/ --exclude=/custom/ --exclude=/public/custom/ --exclude=/public/__generated/ /dumps/EFS_DV-4.2_0057/* .

  • Healself im DV Verzeichnis ausf√ºhren /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php-5.3.6/bin/php support/healself.php

  • f√ºr PHP 5.6: /opt/pdp/opst/apps/php56/bin/php support/healself.php

  • DV 4.4 und neuer die Standard-Themes noch nach syncen, kann ab EFS 19.4 verwendet werden!

  • in das /dv/public/themes Verzeichnis wechseln:

rsync -avnqz --delete /dumps/EFS_DV-4.4_0005/public/themes/* .

  • Ab DV 4.4 m√ºssen mehr Ordner excluded und wegen SSO auch noch die neuen Login-Masken (Themes) seperat nochmal gesynct werden:

  • WICHTIG: vor allen RSYNC-Befehlen unbedingt die Rechte der Quelldateien auf 775 √§ndern mit chmod 775 EFS_DV-4.X und die Admins bitten die Rechte unter /dv grade zu ziehen

  • 1. rsync-Befehl f√ºr das Build

rsync -avnqz --omit-dir-times --delete --exclude=/application/configs/application.ini --exclude=/public/__generated --exclude=/public/userfiles --exclude=/public/custom --exclude=/custom --exclude=/public/themes /dumps/EFS_DV-4.4_0012/* .

  • 2. f√ºr die Standard-Themes:

rsync -avnqz --omit-dir-times --delete /dumps/EFS_DV-4.4_0012/public/themes/standard/* public/themes/standard/

  • 3. f√ºr die Login-Themes:

rsync -avnqz --omit-dir-times --delete /dumps/EFS_DV-4.4_0012/public/themes/standard_login/* public/themes/standard_login/

  • Ab DV 4.5 entfallen Schritt 2 und 3 da an den templates nicht mehr gearbeitet wurde:

  • WICHTIG: vor allen RSYNC-Befehlen unbedingt die Rechte der Quelldateien auf 775 √§ndern mit chmod 775 EFS_DV-4.X und die Admins bitten die Rechte unter /dv grade zu ziehen

  • rsync-Befehl f√ºr das Build (ohne 'n' dann ausf√ºhren)

rsync -avnqz --omit-dir-times --delete --exclude=/application/configs/application.ini --exclude=/public/__generated --exclude=/public/userfiles --exclude=/public/custom --exclude=/custom --exclude=/public/themes /dumps/EFS_DV-4.5_0004/* .

  • run healself

Remove Datavoyager

Send Ticket to Sysadmins requesting:

[]remove of the
